originalText.text:
This was our first time at Kidville Upper West Side. My 4 year old had an appointment with Suzanne A
who is absolutely amazing. if I can give her 15 stars ðŸ¤© I would!!! She is patient and kind and understanding. She reassured me my 4 years in good hands after a huge meltdown. His attitude changed as soon as he took a seat in the car seat. Suzanne
Let him play with any toy he asked for with no hesitation. My son is a mover and she was awesome with cutting his hair short moving right along with him everytime he turned his head to ask for another toy ðŸ˜‚. We will definitely be booking our next and future appointments with Suzanne. Thank you Suzanne again!!!

originalText.text: 10/10 for kids haircuts. Went here today for my sonâ€™s first haircut and Suzanne was wonderful. She made both mama and baby very comfortable throughout the process and his hair came out looking great. Would definitely recommend for a toddlerâ€™s haircut.

originalText.text: Could not be happier with our experience at Kidville on 88th St. for our one year oldâ€™s haircut and definitely coming back. Everything was super clean and everyone super friendly. Leona at the front desk was extremely welcoming and friendly and not only that but also flexible as she let us change the time of our appointment on the same day. Moreover, they let us play in the kids gym after the haircut. The gym has everything â€“ so many places to bounce and roll. In terms of the actual haircut, Gloria did an exceptional job. She was so friendly and patient (it was only his second haircut!) But she also did a great job on a rather complicated haircut (it was basically an undercut). When the haircut was done she thoroughly reviewed to make sure all the details were right. Could not be happier and looking forward to coming back!

originalText.text: Purchased a month-long membership here when I was in NYC for three weeks with my one-year-old, and I'm so glad I did! A lifesaver on rainy days. The staff-led classes were super fun and engaging, and they were super sweet and welcoming. The playspace is a great area to safely let a new walker explore to her heart's content. And the front desk was super fast and flexible with schedule changes! Overall, highly recommend!
